thread.title: Tamron Hall back at work shooting Deadline Crime | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tamron Hall back at work shooting Deadline Crime | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris Spargo For Dailymail.Com
title: Tamron Hall back at work shooting Deadline Crime | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Tamron Hall back at work shooting new season of Deadline Crime after hitting up the Super Bowl, Grammys and fashion parties during jam-packed two-week vacation following NBC exit Tamron Hall posted video of herself on the set of Deadline Crime in Potsdam, New York on Wednesday She is back at work shooting the fifth season of the show, which is produced by NBC's Peacock productions but airs on Investigation Discovery Hall, 46, had been enjoying an unexpected two week vacation after walking away from her job at NBC News following 10 years with the company She went to the Super Bowl in Houston, Grammys weekend in Los Angeles and then the opera in New York The popular host left NBC after being told she was losing her today time slot to Megyn Kelly when she joins the network later this year Hall has not spoken publicly about her decision and there is no word on where she may wind up next Published: 00:34 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 21:00 GMT, 16 February 2017 159 shares
